CustomField.formula: OR(AND( ActivityDate < TODAY(), CONTAINS(TEXT(Confirmation_Status__c), "Confirmed"), Owner:User.Id <> "005410000063Ajs", Owner:User.Id <> "00541000005Hdpd",TEXT(Appointment_results__c) = "" ),AND( ActivityDate < TODAY(), TEXT(Confirmation_Status__c) = "CVT", Owner:User.Id <> "005410000063Ajs", Owner:User.Id <> "00541000005Hdpd",TEXT(Appointment_results__c) = "" ), AND( ActivityDate < TODAY(), TEXT(Confirmation_Status__c) = "CV", Owner:User.Id <> "00541000005Hdpd", Owner:User.Id <> "005410000063Ajs",TEXT(Appointment_results__c) = "" ),AND( ActivityDate < TODAY(), TEXT(Confirmation_Status__c) = "CRB", Owner:User.Id <> "00541000005Hdpd", Owner:User.Id <> "005410000063Ajs",TEXT(Appointment_results__c) = "" ))
CustomField.label: Not Ran
